Package cryptoTrader.utils

Class TradingBroker

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.utils.TradingBroker
public class TradingBroker
extends java.lang.Object
Date: April 3, 2022 This class is the TradingBroker object which holds information about each trading broker that is used throughout the runtime of the program. The variables held are the brokers name, the list of coins they are requesting, the strategy they wish to use, and the tradingBrokerID which is used to track if brokers make multiple trades
Author:
Ethan Borg and Michael Mendes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TradingBroker()
    This constructor is the default constructor for this class which assigns the class variables particular values.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TradeActivity declareInterest()
    This method is invoked when the broker will be used to invoke a trade by mainUI.
    void failedStrategy()
    This method is invoked when the strategy used suggest that the coins requested were rather invalid or no trade should be made by the broker based on the trends of the market
    CryptoCoinList getCoinList()
    This method will return the list of cryptos being used by the broker
    java.lang.String getName()
    This method will return the name of the broker
    java.lang.String getStrategy()
    This method returns the strategy used by the broker
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getStrategyList()
    This method will return the Array list holding all the strategies that the broker has used throughout its trading history
    int getTradingBrokerID()
    This method returns the trading brokers ID
    void setList​(CryptoCoinList list)
    This method sets the list of cryptos the broker is currently using
    void setName​(java.lang.String brokerName)
    This method sets the name of the broker
    void setStrategy​(java.lang.String newStrategy)
    This method sets the stratefy being used by the broker with a String variable
    void setTradingBrokerID​(int ID)
    This method sets the id value of the broker with an integer
    void update()
    This method will update the console when the broker ArrayList is updated

  • Constructor Details

    • TradingBroker

      public TradingBroker()
      This constructor is the default constructor for this class which assigns the class variables particular values. The values are all nullified

  • Method Details

    • setName

      public void setName​(java.lang.String brokerName)
      This method sets the name of the broker
      Parameters:
      brokerName - is a String holding the name of the broker

    • setList

      public void setList​(CryptoCoinList list)
      This method sets the list of cryptos the broker is currently using
      Parameters:
      list - is a CryptoCoinList object which holds the coins requested by the broker

    • setStrategy

      public void setStrategy​(java.lang.String newStrategy)
      This method sets the stratefy being used by the broker with a String variable
      Parameters:
      newStrategy - is a String containing the strategy the broker will use

    • failedStrategy

      public void failedStrategy()
      This method is invoked when the strategy used suggest that the coins requested were rather invalid or no trade should be made by the broker based on the trends of the market

    • setTradingBrokerID

      public void setTradingBrokerID​(int ID)
      This method sets the id value of the broker with an integer
      Parameters:
      ID - is an int that holds the ID value of the broker

    • declareInterest

      public TradeActivity declareInterest()
      This method is invoked when the broker will be used to invoke a trade by mainUI. An operation object is created to return a trade activity which will be suggested to the broker
      Returns:
      TradeActivity object that will hold information about the brokers trade

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      This method will return the name of the broker
      Returns:
      A String containing the name of the broker

    • getCoinList

      public CryptoCoinList getCoinList()
      This method will return the list of cryptos being used by the broker
      Returns:
      CryptoCoinList object holding the coins requested by the broker

    • getStrategy

      public java.lang.String getStrategy()
      This method returns the strategy used by the broker
      Returns:
      String containing the strategy used by the broker

    • getStrategyList

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getStrategyList()
      This method will return the Array list holding all the strategies that the broker has used throughout its trading history
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing a bunch of Strings with the value of strategies previously used by the broker

    • getTradingBrokerID

      public int getTradingBrokerID()
      This method returns the trading brokers ID
      Returns:
      Int conatining the ID of the broker

    • update

      public void update()
      This method will update the console when the broker ArrayList is updated
